description:
Alice declares war on Iska in order to put an end to their easy relationship as a friendly rival.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Bataille décisive – Notre dernière croisade ou la nuit de notre promesse –
Kessen: Kimi to Boku no Saigo no Kessen, Arui wa Futari ga Chikau Yoru
Last Crusade: Our Last Crusade or the Night We Make Our Vow
決戦 -キミと僕の最後の決戦, あるいは二人が誓う夜-
